short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically resize the Outsystems training page video player in larger mode without using fullscreen feature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically resize the Outsystems training page videos in a large player. Useful if you using multiple windows on a wide screen monitor without going into full screen.



Note: This is not an official extension. Just sharing my personal extension with other fellow members who just started the journey of becoming Outsystems developer.
